name: Paragon Gale
description:
Paragon Gale is a game based on the 2016 Famicase entry by Mike Lambert (http://famicase.com/16/softs/117.html). Made for A Game By Its Cover 2017 game jam. Cute small platformer: secrets, bonuses, upgrades, bosses. Three weeks to develop - three complete levels. Original NES palette and other things from 80s-90s.

    Cristals. Collect 100 to obtain an extra life

    Extra life itself

    Restore 1 HP

    This jug increases your maximum HP

Controls (keyboard):

  • [move] - arrows
  • [jump] - z
  • [hit] - x
  • [pause] - space
  • [ok] - z
  • [cancel] - esc

Controls (xbox360 gamepad):

  • [move] - d-pad, left stick
  • [jump] - a
  • [hit] - b
  • [pause] - start
  • [ok] - a
  • [cancel] - x
